short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add Draw Cells animations to your Google Slides or Powerpoint presentations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is supposed to work in combination with the Draw Cells website (https://draw-cells.netlify.app) and allows Draw Cells users to inject their animations into their Google Slides presentations.
